pages.text: kya ais nahin hai ki hamane tumhe tuchchh jal se paida kiya
phir hamane use ek surakshit tikane kee jagah rakha
ek gyaat aur nishchit avadhi tak
phir hamane andaaja thaharaaya, to ham kya hee achchha andaaza thaharaanevaale hai
tabaahee hai us din jhoothalaanevaalon kee
kya aisa nahin hai ki hamane dharatee ko samet rakhanevaalee banaaya
zindon ko bhee aur murdon ko bhee
aur usamen oonche-oonche pahaad jamae aur tumhen meetha paanee pilaaya
tabaahee hai us din jhuthalaanevaalon kee
chalo us cheez kee or jise tum jhuthalaate rahe ho
chalo teen shaakhaonvaalee chhaaya kee or
jisamen na chhaanv hai aur na vah agni-jvaala se bacha sakatee hai
nissandeh ve (jvaalaen) mahal jaisee (oonchee) chingaariyaan phenkatee hai
maano ve peele oont hain
tabaahee hai us jhuthalaanevaalon kee
yah vah din hai ki ve kuchh bol nahin rahe hai
to koee uz pesh karen, (baat yah hai ki) unhen bolane kee anumati nahin dee ja rahee hai
tabaahee hai us din jhuthalaanevaalon kee
yah faisale ka din hai, hamane tumhen bhee aur pahalon ko bhee ikattha kar diya
ab yadi tumhaare paas koee chaal hai to mere viruddh chalo.
tabaahee hai us din jhuthalaanevaalo kee
nissandeh dar rakhanevaale chhaanvon aur sroton mein hai
aur un phalon ke beech jo ve chaahe
khao-piyo maze se, us karmon ke badale mein jo tum karate rahe ho.
nishchay hee uttamakaaron ko ham aisa hee badala dete hai
tabaahee hai us din jhuthalaanevaalon kee
kha lo aur maze kar lo thoda-sa, vaastav mein tum aparaadhee ho
tabaahee hai us din jhuthalaanevaalon kee
jab unase kaha jaata hai ki "jhuko! to nahin jhukate.
tabaahee hai us din jhuthalaanevaalon kee
ab aakhir isake pashchaat kis vaanee par ve eemaan laenge
